title: Call recorder
content:
I cannot record phone calls in my  Pixel 4a 5G I don't know why?
There is no recording option active while I'm calling someone or talking to them. If it's because of country call policies then it's not prohibited here in Afghanistan!
My before Pixel phones were great because I could record call with them but with this iam in trouble!
Please help me to activate the recording option. I'm in Afghanistan now.
Sincerely!
